title: Episode #77 "Moe n' Joe"
description:
This week Michael and Steve welcome the beautiful Emily Wickersham (Rhiannon Flammer) and Pete Bucossi (Sopranos Stunt Coordinator) to the Talking Sopranos podcast.

Can you believe the Sopranos was actually Emily’s first real acting gig. She talks about how she got the job and what it was like being on the set with such an incredible cast. Then Pete Bucossi, the Sopranos Stunt Coordinator joins the podcast. He breaks down a few of the show's most famous stunts including the big one when Christopher rolls a car over a cliff and dies. 

After that Michael and Steve breakdown Moe n’Joe S6 – Ep10….another fantastic episode! Make sure to subscribe to the Talking Sopranos podcast wherever you get your podcasts and go to the Talking Sopranos website to ask Michael and Steve questions and buy official merchandise. 

Get Sopranos Memorabilia and more at

https://collectiblexchange.com

Check out Comedy and Conversations with the Sopranos Live. Get your tickets today!

https://www.ticketmaster.com/in-conversation-with-the-sopranos-tickets/artist/2683319
